Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Pentecost:

Text.Language: Pa[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: v/eyn/ou qen tefmahc~nou] m~paroucia~: a~riounai n~a~gap/ neman: qen pekb/ma etoi n~ho].
My Lord Jesus Christ, who is coming in His second advent, grant us loving mercy, before Your fearsome judgment seat.
